bool pangolin::PleoraVideo::GrabNewest ( unsigned char *  image,
bool  wait = true 
)
virtual

Copy the newest frame from the camera to image discarding all older frames.

Optionally wait for a frame if one isn't ready Returns true iff image was copied

Implements pangolin::VideoInterface.
